plugin.name: Ritual_Emotes
plugin.author: Niamh
plugin.description:
This plugin automates the emotes for rituals, assuming another party is in the room while evoking. The pronouns are currently female, but can be changed with very little adjustment on the user's part.
RITUAL KEYWORDS All rituals are keyworded to their first major word. Where 'the' is the first word, ignore it and use the first word that isn't 'the.' You can use RITLIST if you're confused.
USAGE ritlist -- Print the keywords for all rituals. rit <ritual keyword> -- Perform a standard ritual. rinv <ritual keyword> -- Perform an inverted ritual. rithelp -- Print this list.

alias.send: ritual axa chants "[EAxaxis Ionem[w," in a soft, luring monotone.
ritual iscis chants, "[EIscis sicsi[x" in a soft, luring monotone.
ritual invert iscis chants, "[EIscis sicsi[x," in a strange, discordant rhythm.
ritual invert axa chants, "[EAxaxis ionem[w," in a strange, discordant rhythm.
ritual invert bela chants, "[EBelatuus mortana[x," in a strange, discordant rhythm.
ritual refrain sings a few lines of a light-hearted, upbeat melody in a strange language.
ritual invert refrain sings a few lines of a light-hearted, upbeat melody in a strange language.
ritual bela chants "[EBelatuus mortana[x," in a soft, luring monotone.
ritual perala chants "[EPerala agala[x," in a soft, luring monotone.
ritual invert perala chants, "[EPerala agala[x," in a strange, discordant rhythm.
ritual song sings a mournful-sounding tune in a strange, alien language.
ritual invert song sings a mournful-sounding tune in a strange, alien language.
ritual lament sings a quickly-paced, sad song in a strange, alien language.
ritual invert lament sings a quickly-paced, sad song in a strange, alien language.
ritual chorus sings a proud, rousing song in a strange, alien language.
ritual invert chorus sings a proud, rousing song in a strange, alien language.
ritual ballad sings an aggressive-sounding song in a strange language.
ritual invert ballad sings an aggressive-sounding song in a strange language.
ritual six turns into a circular dance with light-footed steps.
ritual invert six turns into a circular dance with light-footed steps.
ritual dance performs the steps of a rhythmic dance, taking distinct poses.
ritual invert an'ell chants, "[EAn'ell nectrac[w," in a strange, discordant rhythm.
ritual invert dance performs the steps of a rhythmic dance, taking distinct poses.
ritual leopard lifts both hands and emulates claws, turning into a tight, square-stepped dance.
ritual invert leopard lifts both hands and emulates claws, turning into a tight, square-stepped dance.
ritual jig performs a series of quick dance steps, feet moving gracefully in a jig formation.
ritual invert jig performs a series of quick dance steps, feet moving gracefully in a jig formation.
ritual charali whirls through the steps of a girlish dance.
ritual invert charali whirls through the steps of a girlish dance.
ritual nine drags a knife across her palm and squeezes to produce nine equal droplets of blood.
ritual invert nine drags a knife across her palm and squeezes to produce nine equal droplets of blood.
ritual shorn clips a single lock of hair off of her head and releases it into a sudden gust of wind.
ritual invert shorn clips a single lock of hair off of her head and releases it into a sudden gust of wind.
ritual black convulses violently, gagging until a globule of black bile emerges from her lips.
ritual invert black convulses violently, gagging until a globule of black bile emerges from her lips.
ritual coin lays a silver coin over her thumb and tosses it upwards. It disappears with a flash mid-air.
ritual invert coin lays a silver coin over her thumb and tosses it upwards. It disappears with a flash mid-air.
ritual memories closes her eyes, meditating on a memory. When her eyes open they are slightly blank.
ritual dark traces the shape of a strange rune into the air. It flares into existence, briefly, as crackling energy.
ritual invert dark traces the shape of a strange rune into the air. It flares into existence, briefly, as crackling energy.
ritual sign traces the shape of a strange rune into the air. It flares into existence, briefly, as crackling energy.
ritual invert memories closes her eyes, meditating on a memory. When her eyes open they are slightly blank.
ritual invert sign traces the shape of a strange rune into the air. It flares into existence, briefly, as crackling energy.
ritual symbol traces the shape of a strange rune into the air. It flares into existence, briefly, as crackling energy.
ritual invert symbol traces the shape of a strange rune into the air. It flares into existence, briefly, as crackling energy.
ritual thandok traces the shape of a strange rune into the air. It flares into existence, briefly, as crackling energy.
ritual invert thandok traces the shape of a strange rune into the air. It flares into existence, briefly, as crackling energy.
ritual mark traces the shape of a strange rune into the air. It flares into existence, briefly, as crackling energy.
ritual invert mark traces the shape of a strange rune into the air. It flares into existence, briefly, as crackling energy.
ritual an'ell chants "[EAn'ell nectrac[w," in a soft, luring monotone.

function rithelp() Note("USAGE") Note("ritlist -- Print the keywords for all rituals.") Note("rit <ritual keyword> -- Perform a standard ritual.") Note("rinv <ritual keyword> -- Perform an inverted ritual.") Note("rithelp -- Print this list.") Note("\n") end
